data.title: Hiten Tejwani Shares A Monochrome Picture With Wife, Gauri Pradhan, Says He Will Always Love Her
data.meta_description: Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan always melt our hearts with their beautiful camaraderie. On July 15, 2020, Hiten shared a monochrome picture with Gauri and we
data.text:
From strangers to friends and then to soulmates, the journey of the ideal couple of television, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan is one of the most romantic one. Someone is destined for you somewhere stands perfectly true in the case of this lovely couple. When soaps operas were religiously watched in every household, the main leads had become a part of our lives. Mihir-Tulsi, Om-Parvati, Prerna-Anurag, Kashish-Sujal, each character had connected with the audience. As we talk about the lead pairs of the telly world, how can we forget Karan-Nandini from the serial, Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi. Just like their on-screen chemistry, this couple, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan has blown our minds with the off-screen love too. (Also Read: Sushmita Sen's 'Rooh', Rohman Shawl Turns Teacher For Alisah, Helps Her Solve A Mathematics Problem)

advertisement

Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan had met officially on a commercial ad shoot for the first time. Although, earlier when they had seen each other at Mumbai airport, the two were not aware that they were paired with one another in a TV commercial. Love had blossomed between Hiten and Gauri when they were paired opposite each other in the serial, Kutumb. Hiten and Gauri had entered marital bliss on April 29, 2004. On November 11, 2009, Gauri and Hiten had become parents and had welcomed their twins, Nevaan and Katya.

advertisement

advertisement

Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan had completed 16 years of marital bliss and even after 16 years, this couple gives major relationship goals to the millennials. Both Hiten and Gauri have never shied away from flaunting their love for one another. On July 16, 2020, Hiten took to his Instagram handle and shared a monochrome picture with his soulmate, Gauri. Curled up in each other’s arms, both Hiten and Gauri looked like a match-made-in-heaven as they smiled for the camera. Along with the picture, Hiten wrote a heart-melting caption, which can be read as “Love is all I have ...and will always love you.”

advertisement

On October 30, 2019, Hiten and Gauri’s debut serial, Kutumb had completed 18 years. He had taken to his Instagram handle and had shared a collage of pictures, wherein one was from the poster of Kutumb and another one of himself with his wife, Gauri. With the Kutumb Se Kutumb Tak picture, he had also written a heartfelt message thanking the makers of the serial, Kutumb, which could be read as “18 years ...there are so many of you to thank to..Thank u @ektaravikapoor, #shobhaji, @balajitelefilmslimited @sarnadheeraj @immaheshpandey @niveditabasu ,all the technicians @sanjaymemane @gpradhan and everyone associated with #kutumb ..Hapoy 18th..Thank you all my fans for your support and blessings and thank u @vijayanambiar for this creative ..Thank u to each n everyone.” (Also Read: Soha Ali Khan's Daughter, Inaaya Naumi Kemmu Is On A Mission To Clean The World, Arranges The Pieces)

advertisement

On April 29, 2020, the lovely couple had celebrated their 16th wedding anniversary. Gauri had taken to her Instagram handle to post a lovely video of her anniversary celebrations at home with her husband, Hiten and kids. She had captioned the video as "The day started with the devastating news about Irfan Sir..dint feel like celebrating..but had to do something because kids were excited..so baked a simple and healthy cake with the kids on the gas(oven still not working)and cut it with everyone..thank you all for your lovely wishes!! really means a lot!! # 16years #togetherness #katya #nevaan #fightagainstcorona #lockdown."

Gauri and Hiten’s bond always reinstate our faith in love. On March 3, 2020, Gauri Pradhan had taken to her Instagram handle to post a beautiful picture with her husband, Hiten. In the picture, we could see Gauri hugging Hiten from behind, smiling blissfully. Hiten and Gauri had twinned with each other in white and had looked like 'made for each other'. Along with the beautiful picture, Gauri had written down a sweet caption that could be read as “Happy birthday to my best friend, my soulmate! Love you” followed by three heart emoticons. (Also Read: Ajay Devgn Celebrates 'Reel And Real' Love With Kajol As 'Pyaar Toh Hona Hi Tha' Completes 22 Years)

advertisement.

Hiten and Gauri look perfect with each other. What do you think? Let us know.
